page.title: 09 LIFESTYLES -CHILDREN 7-11.
page.content: The{average}size family in the Brighouse area contains 2 adults and 2 children.The greatest majority, more than 90% own their own home. Over 50% live in stone built, 3 bedroom semi-detached houses. {Children}usually get up between 07.00 and 08.00 on school days and have cold cereal and milk for{breakfast.}Most live less than 15 minutes walk from school, yet over half the children are brought by car.After{school,}most children have an adult waiting for them at home. 50% of mothers work either full or part time. After school, children typically spend their time as follows;-{playing}either indoors or out - 2hours.{Homework, } voluntary, given at school(this includes reading a school story book) 45minutes.
